heading: Radisson Blu Bay View
desc: Luxury hotel in Chittagong with 3 restaurants and spa

reviews.message: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback from your visit to the Radisson Blu Chattogram Bay View . We are delighted to read from your review that you had enjoyed your recent stay with us and we also appreciate you pointing out the excellent service you received from our ambassadors.

policies.heading: Hygiene & cleanliness
policies.info: This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property, and commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays. Personal protective equipment, including masks and gloves, will be available to guests. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. Contactless check-in is available. This property affirms that it follows the cleaning and disinfection practices of Safety Protocol (Radisson). This property affirms that it adheres to the cleaning and disinfection practices of Safe Travels (WTTC - Global).

about.heading: Radisson Blu Chattogram Bay View
about.desc: Situated on the bay, Radisson Blu Chattogram Bay View is a great choice for a stay in Chittagong. Guests can grab a bite to eat at one of the 3 restaurants and visit the spa to be pampered with hot stone massages, aromatherapy, or reflexology. Other highlights at this luxurious hotel include an outdoor pool, a poolside bar, and a fitness center.

heading: Rahayu Suites Monkey Forest Ubud
desc: Luxury hotel in Ubud,Surrounded by a tropical garden & 2 Bungalows

reviews.message: The hotel is in the center of Ubud, and just a few steps away from the main street (quiet at night). The employees are so kind. If you’re lucky, you’ll see monkeys in the morning passing through the swimming pool area.
Room was very large, clean and comfortable. Great beds and very nice ambience. Nice breakfast, which was freshly made. Excellent location, being very central.

about.heading: Rahayu Suites Monkey Forest Ubud
about.desc: Surrounded by a tropical garden, Rahayu 2 Bungalows features an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout. The Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary, in Ubud, is 500 m away. With a garden-view terrace or balcony, the air-conditioned rooms are all furnished with large windows, dressing table and a wardrobe. The private bathroom is equipped with a bath tub. Breakfast is delivered to guest's rooms daily. The nearest restaurant can be found within a 5-minute walk from the property. The Ubud Palace is a 10-minute walk from the Rahayu. Ngurah Rai International Airport is 40 km away.

heading: The View Chiang Dao Hotel
desc: Luxury hotel in Bangkok, ‘The View Chiang Dao Hotel’ offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub and terrace.

reviews.message: Everything new and clean, very nice views, they gave us the option to rent a motorcycle and it was quite close to everything. It is a very quiet area and nothing touristy but if that is what you are looking for this is your hotel

We arrived late, so we could see the view (and to understand the hotel's name) only in the morning and it was perfect. Great rooftop bar, clean pool and helpful staff. The room was big and the beds were very comfortable. We enjoyed our stay a lot.

heading: Mount Conifer Suites & Spa
desc: Mount Conifer Suites & Spa has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Darjeeling.

reviews.message: Best Hotel ever. Very friendy staff and well maintained rooms. Restaurant at its best. The food was also very good and hygine. Near to market and all the facilities
Very good rooms. Delicious buffets. Good room service. They prepare food for kids on request. Walking distance from Mall Road

about.heading: Mount Conifer Suites & Spa
about.desc: Mount Conifer Suites & Spa has a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Darjeeling. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation offers an ATM and a concierge service for guests. At the hotel, all rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms come with a safety deposit box and certain rooms also offer city views. All guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Guests at Mount Conifer Suites & Spa can enjoy a continental or a vegetarian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Himalayan Mountaineering Institute And Zoological Park, Mahakal Mandir and Japanese Peace Pagoda. The nearest airport is Bagdogra International Airport, 67 km from Mount Conifer Suites & Spa

heading: Hotel Noorjahan Grand
desc: Hotel Noorjahan Grand features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Sylhet.

reviews.message: Everything was amazing - the Rooftop, swimming pool and seating area.The rooftop and Restaurant on the 15th floor had a 360 degree view of Sylhet.Staff were friendly and provided the best service.
Some Amazing staff are very respectful and helpful with good customer service especially Ronny at reception .

about.heading: Hotel Noorjahan Grand
about.desc: Property description Hotel Noorjahan Grand features a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Sylhet. This 4-star hotel offers an ATM and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. Every room includes a TV, and certain units at the hotel have a city view. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. The nearest airport is Osmani International Airport, 8 km from Hotel Noorjahan Grand.
